function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of robust and trustful data sharing infrastructures in the medical world","Impact":"Poor adaptation of FAIR principles, decreased data quality and accessibility, increased risk of data misuse","Mitigation":"Developing robust data sharing infrastructures, implementing standardized protocols, and increasing accountability","Technologies":"Data management systems, interoperable platforms, and digital security solutions","People":"Medical professionals, data scientists, IT engineers, legal experts, health care providers","Owner":"Medical institutions, data science organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Suboptimal data science literacy in the health sector","Impact":"Inadequate data management, lower quality scores in medical research, and limited sample size in studies","Mitigation":"Providing interdisciplinary training, enhancing digital literacy, and improving technical skills of health care professionals","Technologies":"Training programs, digital literacy tools, and data analysis platforms","People":"Health care professionals, data scientists, IT engineers, legal experts","Owner":"Health care organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Data collection and harmonization challenges in observational studies","Impact":"Lower quality scores in SARS-CoV2 research, limited statistical power, and biases in integrated results","Mitigation":"Implementing standardized data collection methodologies, planning data analysis across centers, and harmonizing data across different cohorts","Technologies":"Data collection tools, statistical analysis software, and interoperable research platforms","People":"Researchers, data scientists, medical professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
